item.title: Emote/Teleport Help
item.dc:creator: @o_b_b_y_k_o o b b y k o
item.description:
@o_b_b_y_k_o wrote:

playerHeight += 1; if your going upstairs, playerHeight -= 1; if your going downstairs.

item.title: Emote/Teleport Help
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

case 161: //ARDY TELE
if(emotes == 0)
{
teleportToX = 2662;
teleportToY = 3305;
}
else
{
emotes = 0;
pEmote = playerSE;
player.playerHeight = 1;
updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
break;

Read full topic

To make your things easier to read do this

WHATEVER YOU WANT TO SAY HERE

[code} (Last “}” make a ])
[/code} "

-Newbi

item.title: Emote/Teleport Help
item.dc:creator: @Altodude8 Altodude8
item.description:
@Altodude8 wrote:

On the source I downloaded, in the emotes section, there are teleports.

I noticed a problem when I teleported, though. If I was upstairs when i teleported, I would be upstairs when I got to my destination.

Is there any way to add a height element to those?

Here is a copy of one of the teleports…

case 161: //ARDY TELE if(emotes == 0) { teleportToX = 2662; teleportToY = 3305; } else { emotes = 0; pEmote = playerSE; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } break;

[Note] I still need help!

Read full topic
